com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.ros

Class RosRobotApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubtechinc.cruzr.sdk.ros.RosRobotApi

  • public class RosRobotApi
extends java.lang.Object

    单例模式、对外提供ros控制层api


    Singleton mode, external ros control layer api

    Author:
    paul.zhang@ubtrobot.com

      从当前位置移动到相对位置为(x, y)的坐标去，并转动theta角度；检测到障碍物后停止，并上报通知

      • moveToward

        public int moveToward(float x,
                      float y,
                      float theta)
        分别按Vx、Vy、Vtheta边旋转边前进,检测到障碍物后停止，并上报通知
        Respectively, by Vx, Vy, Vtheta side of the rotation side, after the detection of obstacles to stop, and reported notice
        Parameters:
        x - X方向的速度向量，取值介于-0.8~0.8之间，-0.8和0.8分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度
        The velocity vector in the X direction is between -0.8 and 0.8, -0.8 and 0.8 correspond to the maximum velocity in the negative and square directions, respectively
        y - Y方向的速度向量，取值介于-0.8~0.8之间，-0.8和0.8分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度
        The velocity vector in the Y direction is between -0.8 and 0.8, -0.8 and 0.8 correspond to the maximum velocity in the negative and square directions, respectively
        theta - 旋转的速度向量，取值介于-2~2之间，-2和2分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度 En:{Rotation speed vector, the value between -2 to 2, -2 and 2, respectively, corresponding to the negative direction and the direction of the maximum speed
        Returns:
        0 -- 执行失败 ，-1 -- 应用层禁止，其他 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not，-1 -- forbiddened by application layer, other -- session_id

        等待调用：异步
        wait for call:Async

      • moveToward

        public int moveToward(float x,
                      float y,
                      float theta,
                      RemoteCommonListener listener)
        分别按Vx、Vy、Vtheta边旋转边前进,检测到障碍物后停止，并上报通知
        Respectively, by Vx, Vy, Vtheta side of the rotation side, after the detection of obstacles to stop, and reported notice
        Parameters:
        x - X方向的速度向量，取值介于-0.8~0.8之间，-0.8和0.8分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度
        The velocity vector in the X direction is between -0.8 and 0.8, -0.8 and 0.8 correspond to the maximum velocity in the negative and square directions, respectively
        y - Y方向的速度向量，取值介于-0.8~0.8之间，-0.8和0.8分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度
        The velocity vector in the Y direction is between -0.8 and 0.8, -0.8 and 0.8 correspond to the maximum velocity in the negative and square directions, respectively
        theta - 旋转的速度向量，取值介于-2~2之间，-2和2分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度 En:{Rotation speed vector, the value between -2 to 2, -2 and 2, respectively, corresponding to the negative direction and the direction of the maximum speed
        listener - 回调
        Returns:
        0 -- 执行失败 ，-1 -- 应用层禁止，其他 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not，-1 -- forbiddened by application layer, other -- session_id

        等待调用：异步
        wait for call:Async

      • moveTo

        public int moveTo(float x,
                  float y,
                  float theta,
                  float maxSpeed)
        从当前位置移动到相对位置为(x, y)的坐标去，并转动theta角度；检测到障碍物后停止，并上报通知
        Move from the current position to the coordinate with the relative position (x, y), and turn the theta angle; stop after the detection of the obstacle and report the notification
        Parameters:
        x - X方向的移动距离，单位为米,可以为负值
        X direction of the moving distance, the unit is meters,can be negative
        y - Y方向的移动距离，单位为米,可以为负值
        Y direction of the moving distance, the unit is meters,can be negative
        theta - 旋转的速度向量，取值介于-2~2之间，-2和2分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度 En:{Rotation speed vector, the value between -2 to 2, -2 and 2, respectively, corresponding to the negative direction and the direction of the maximum speed
        maxSpeed - 取值介于-2~2之间，-2和2分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度 En:{Rotation speed vector, the value between -2 to 2, -2 and 2, respectively, corresponding to the negative direction and the direction of the maximum speed
        Returns:
        0 -- 执行失败 ，-1 -- 应用层禁止，其他 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not，-1 -- forbiddened by application layer, other -- session_id

        等待调用：异步
        wait for call:Async

      • moveTo

        public int moveTo(float x,
                  float y,
                  float theta,
                  float maxSpeed,
                  RemoteCommonListener listener)
        从当前位置移动到相对位置为(x, y)的坐标去，并转动theta角度；检测到障碍物后停止，并上报通知
        Move from the current position to the coordinate with the relative position (x, y), and turn the theta angle; stop after the detection of the obstacle and report the notification
        Parameters:
        x - X方向的移动距离，单位为米,可以为负值
        X direction of the moving distance, the unit is meters,can be negative
        y - Y方向的移动距离，单位为米,可以为负值
        Y direction of the moving distance, the unit is meters,can be negative
        theta - 旋转的速度向量，取值介于-2~2之间，-2和2分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度 En:{Rotation speed vector, the value between -2 to 2, -2 and 2, respectively, corresponding to the negative direction and the direction of the maximum speed
        maxSpeed - 取值介于-2~2之间，-2和2分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度 En:{Rotation speed vector, the value between -2 to 2, -2 and 2, respectively, corresponding to the negative direction and the direction of the maximum speed
        listener - 回调
        Returns:
        0 -- 执行失败 ，-1 -- 应用层禁止，其他 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not，-1 -- forbiddened by application layer, other -- session_id

        等待调用：异步
        wait for call:Async

      • getMaxSpeed

        public float getMaxSpeed(int dir)
        获取指定的速度向量，该速度向量包括Vx,Vy,Vtheta
        Gets the specified velocity vector, which includes Vx, Vy, Vtheta
        Parameters:
        dir - 0--X方向；1--Y方向；2--角速度
        0 - X direction; 1 - Y direction; 2 - angular velocity
        Returns:
        最大支持速度
        Maximum support speed

        等待调用：同步
        wait for call:Sync

      • getBattery

        public BatteryInfo getBattery()
        获取当前电池的状态信息，包含电量、是否充电
        Get the current battery status information, including power, whether to charge
        Returns:
        获取当前电池的电量信息，取值范围0~100,100表示电量满格
        Obtains the current battery power information, the value range is 0 ~ 100, 100 indicates the electric quantity is full

        等待调用：同步
        wait for call:Sync

      • getBodyNames

        public java.lang.String[] getBodyNames(java.lang.String part)
        根据名称获取机器人身体关节部件的列表,此方法ros层还未定义 参数和返回值暂无法列出
        According to the name of the robot body parts of the list, this method ros layer has not yet defined parameters and return value temporarily unable to list
        Parameters:
        part - 身体部位名称
        Name of body part
        Returns:
        根据部位名称，列出该部位上的全部关节名称.如name为body，就列出身上全部的关节名称；如果name为leftHandJointNames，就列表左手的全部关节的名称
        According to the name of the site, the list of all the joints on the name, such as name for the body, to list all the joint name; if the name is leftHandJointNames, the list of the left hand all the joint name

        等待调用：同步
        wait for call:Sync

      • angleInterpolation

        public int angleInterpolation(java.lang.String[] names,
                              java.util.List<float[]> angles,
                              java.util.List<float[]> times,
                              int absolute)
        控制各关节在指定的时间内旋转多少角度(包含多个插值)
        Control how many angles (including multiple interpolations) of each joint in a given time,
        Parameters:
        names - LWrist(左腕关节)、LElbow(左肘关节)、HeadPitch（头上下转关节）等； 具体值参考 RosConstant.Joint
        Wrist (left wrist), Elbow (left elbow), Head Pitch (head up and down joints), etc .; specific reference RosConstant.Joint
        angleList - 上述关节各自旋转的角度插值列表；
        Each of the joints is rotated by the angle of the interpolation list
        timeLists - 关节旋转到指定角度插值分别所需的时间列表；
        The rotation of the joint to the specified angle is the time required for the list
        isAbsolute - 上述旋转的角度是绝对值还是相对值;
        The angle of rotation is absolute or relative
        Returns:
        0 -- 操作失败；非0 -- 操作成功
        0 -- fail,not 0 -- session_id

        等待调用：异步
        wait for call:Async

        public int angleInterpolationWithSpeed(java.lang.String[] names,
                                       java.util.List<float[]> angles,
                                       float max_speed,
                                       int absolute)
        控制各关节在不超过最高速度的情况下旋转多少角度(包含多个插值)；
        Controls how many angles (including multiple interpolations) that each joint rotates without exceeding the maximum speed;
        Parameters:
        names - LWrist(左腕关节)、LElbow(左肘关节)、HeadPitch（头上下转关节）等； 具体值参考 RosConstant.Joint
        Wrist (left wrist), Elbow (left elbow), Head Pitch (head up and down joints), etc .; specific reference RosConstant.Joint
        angleList - 上述关节各自旋转的角度插值列表；
        Each of the joints is rotated by the angle of the interpolation list
        maxSpeedFraction - 最高运动速度，0~100, 0代表无速度，100代表最高速度；
        Maximum speed, 0 ~ 100, 0 represents no speed, 100 represents the highest speed
        isAbsolute - 上述旋转的角度是绝对值还是相对值；
        The angle of rotation is absolute or relative
        Returns:
        0 -- 操作失败；非0 -- 操作成功
        0 -- fail,not 0 -- session_id

      • runWithEskinEnable

        public int runWithEskinEnable(java.lang.String[] name,
                              int eskinMask)
        播放指定路径的预设动作文件并且控制是否使用电子皮肤
        Play the default action file for the specified path and control whether or not to use electronic skin
        Parameters:
        name - 动作名列表
        List of action names
        eskinMask - 0x01 左手掌电子皮肤 0x02 左手掌电子开关 0x04 左前手臂电子皮肤 0x08 左后手臂电子皮肤 0x10 右手掌电子皮肤 0x20 右手掌电子开关 0x40 右前手臂电子皮肤 0x80 右后手臂电子皮肤 全部打开 eskinMask = 0xff
        右后手臂电子皮肤 右前手臂电子皮肤 右手掌电子开关 右手掌电子皮肤 左后手臂电子皮肤 左前手臂电子皮肤 左手掌电子开关 左手掌电子皮肤
        1 1 1 1 1 1 1 1
        关闭"左手掌电子皮肤"和"左前手臂电子皮肤"，其它打开. eskinMask =0x5f
        右后手臂电子皮肤 右前手臂电子皮肤 右手掌电子开关 右手掌电子皮肤 左后手臂电子皮肤 左前手臂电子皮肤 左手掌电子开关 左手掌电子皮肤
        0 1 0 1 1 1 1 1

        0x01 left palm electronic skin 0x02 left palm electronic switch 0x04 left front arm electronic skin 0x08 left rear arm electronic skin 0x10 right palm electronic skin 0x20 right palm electronic switch 0x40 right front arm electronic skin 0x80 right rear arm electronic skin all open eskinMask = 0xff
        right rear arm electronic skin right front arm electronic skin right palm electronic switch right palm electronic skin left rear arm electronic skin left front arm electronic skin left palm electronic switch left palm electronic skin
        1 1 1 1 1 1 1 1
        Close the "left palm electronic skin" and "left front arm electronic skin", the other open. eskinMask =0x5f
        right rear arm electronic skin right front arm electronic skin right palm electronic switch right palm electronic skin left rear arm electronic skin left front arm electronic skin left palm electronic switch left palm electronic skin
        0 1 0 1 1 1 1 1
        Returns:
        0 -- 执行失败 ，-1 -- 应用层禁止，其他 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not，-1 -- forbiddened by application layer, other -- session_id

        等待调用：异步

      • setNavigateSpeed

        public int setNavigateSpeed(float speed)
        设置导航预设速度
        Set the navigation preset speed 该速度仅由 navigateToByPresetedSpeed(float, float, float)里面使用
        The speed is only used by navigateToByPresetedSpeed(float, float, float)
        Parameters:
        speed - 预设速度值
        preset speed
        Returns:
        1 -- 成功；0 -- 失败
        1 - success; 0 - failed

      • getNavigateSpeed

        public float getNavigateSpeed()
        获取导航预设速度
        Get the navigation preset speed 该速度仅由 navigateToByPresetedSpeed(float, float, float)里面使用,未设置默认返回0.2f
        The speed is only used by navigateToByPresetedSpeed(float, float, float),the default return 0.2f
        Returns:
        预设导航速度值
        Default navigation speed value

      • navigateToByPresetedSpeed

        public int navigateToByPresetedSpeed(float x,
                                     float y,
                                     float theta)
        导航到相对坐标为绝对坐标为(x, y)的地方去(速度为预设速度，可由setNavigateSpeed(float)先设置)
        Navigate to the relative coordinate where the absolute coordinates are (x, y) (the speed is the preset speed, which can be set by setNavigateSpeed(float)
        Parameters:
        x - -- X方向的绝对坐标值；
        The absolute coordinates of the X direction
        y - --Y方向的绝对坐标值；
        The absolute coordinates of the Y direction
        theta - -- 朝向 (取值为[-PI ~ PI])
        Orientation (value is [-PI ~ PI])
        Returns:
        0 -- 执行失败 ，-1 -- 应用层禁止，其他 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not，-1 -- forbiddened by application layer, other -- session_id

      • getProperty

        public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                    java.lang.String defalutValue)
        获取属性
        Parameters:
        key - -- 全局唯一属性关键字. (见集成文档附录D) 比如：超声传感器 “sensor.ultrasonic” defaultValue -- 默认的属性的值,若key不存在则直接返回该值.
        Returns:
        成功返回属性的值, 否则返回defaultValue

        等待调用：同步
        wait for call:Sync

      • setFingerAdjust

        public int setFingerAdjust(java.lang.String value)
        零点设置手指角度调试
        Zero set finger angle debug
        Parameters:
        value - 手指参数 "leftIncrease"---左手指角度增加； "leftDecrease"---左手指角度减少； "rightIncrease"---右手指角度增加； "rightDecrease"---右手指角度减少；
        finger parameter "leftIncrease" --- left finger angle increase; "leftDecrease" --- left finger angle reduction; "rightIncrease" --- right finger angle increases; "rightDecrease" --- right finger angle reduction;
        Returns:
        0 -- 操作失败；非0 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not 0 -- session_id

        等待调用：异步
        wait for call:Async

      • navigateTrackTo

        public int navigateTrackTo(float x,
                           float y,
                           float theta,
                           float maxSpeed,
                           int retryCount,
                           int interval)
        轨道模式导航到绝对坐标为(x,y)的地方去
        The track mode navigates to the place where the absolute coordinates are (x, y)
        Parameters:
        x - -- X方向的绝对坐标值；
        The absolute coordinates of the X direction
        y - --Y方向的绝对坐标值；
        The absolute coordinates of the Y direction
        theta - -- 朝向 (取值为[-PI ~ PI])
        Orientation (value is [-PI ~ PI])
        maxSpeed - 最大移动速度
        Maximum moving speed
        retryCount - 在同一个障碍物前重试次数
        Number of retries before the same obstacle
        interval - 重试时间间隔 单位 ：秒
        Retry interval in seconds
        Returns:
        0 -- 执行失败 ，-1 -- 应用层禁止，其他 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not，-1 -- forbiddened by application layer, other -- session_id

        等待调用：异步
        wait for call:Async

      • moveTo2

        public int moveTo2(float x,
                   float y,
                   float theta,
                   float maxSpeed)
        从当前位置移动到相对位置为(x, y)的坐标去，并转动theta角度；检测到障碍物后停止，并上报通知,无减速处理
        Move from the current position to the coordinate with the relative position (x, y), and turn the theta angle; stop after the detection of the obstacle and report the notification
        Parameters:
        x - X方向的移动距离，单位为米,可以为负值
        X direction of the moving distance, the unit is meters,can be negative
        y - Y方向的移动距离，单位为米,可以为负值
        Y direction of the moving distance, the unit is meters,can be negative
        theta - 旋转的速度向量，取值介于-2~2之间，-2和2分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度 En:{Rotation speed vector, the value between -2 to 2, -2 and 2, respectively, corresponding to the negative direction and the direction of the maximum speed
        maxSpeed - 取值介于-2~2之间，-2和2分别对应于负方向和正方方向的最大速度 En:{Rotation speed vector, the value between -2 to 2, -2 and 2, respectively, corresponding to the negative direction and the direction of the maximum speed
        Returns:
        0 -- 执行失败 ，-1 -- 应用层禁止，其他 -- session_id值
        0 -- fail,not，-1 -- forbiddened by application layer, other -- session_id

        等待调用：异步
        wait for call:Async
